Title: Exiled
Plot: After Vic disowns him, Shane turns to the Armenian mob for help.  Vic gets more involved with the San Marcos investigation, while Dutch and Billings are able to track down someone who survived the massacre.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
